satellite_network_attribute_functions.visibility module¶

satellite_network_attribute_functions.visibility.visibility_function(distance_matrix: ndarray, max_dist: float) → ndarray[source]¶

For each pair of satellites within the network, calculates whether two satellites are visible to one another based on current positions.

Parameters:

  • distance_matrix – an adjacency matrix where each element represents the distance between a satellite pair.

  • max_dist – the maximum distance between satellites over which an ISL may be established.

Returns:

adjacency matrix such that if satellites i and j are visible to one another, visibility[i][j] == 1, else 0
